name: Kardboard Kings: Card Game Island
summary:
In the Card Game Island update, you’ll actually play the card game and face off against other characters by buying a plane ticket to Card Game Island! I’ll go deeper into the card game in the future.

Also coming in the Card Game Island update is a new hard mode appropriately named King of Games. You’ll need to be a king at Kardboard Kings to not close down shop. Each day your reputation takes a small hit, you pay taxes every week, and more. While each small little thing doesn’t do too much but together makes the game that much harder. Can you keep the card shop afloat in this new unfavourable mode?
